website_summaries.verdict: This fridge looks great and has quite a bit more space than others on the market.
pros: Larger size at 5.12 cubic feet of storage
Includes interior lighting and heavy-duty glass shelving
Built-in unit works well in an outdoor kitchen
cons: The price is a bit higher than other models

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Run, do not walk, away from Vinotemp. We purchased this product from Amazon ~ 4 years ago for our outdoor BBQ area, and didn't even get that much time out of it. The control board and sensor are already shot, and between parts and labor, we're looking at $748 to fix it. And of course, it's out of warranty. Outrageous! The telling indictment? The technician, listed by Vinotemp on their website as an approved service provider, shared that Vinotemp products are beyond unreliable. He advised that we chalk up their product disaster as a learning experience and go with a better manufactured and backed brand, like U-line.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: The customer service attempted to resolve the problem but it was not easy to get them to offer me a proper replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a defective product. Also, the company doesn't stand behind its product. The refrigerator malfunctioned about 1 1/2 years after purchase and stopped working. The compressor burned out after this time with only minimal use. It was very disappointing. The customer service attempted to resolve the problem but it was not easy to get them to offer me a proper replacement after allowing a 15% discount on a replacement compressor which would have cost almost $200. It is unfortunate that the product did not perform well and the company was not supportive of their product. It is disappointing that Amazon sells this product for outdoor refrigerators.
customer_reviews.author: karen c.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for outdoor fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor fridge for the BarBQ area. It's very competitively priced when compared to the other outdoor rated fridges. The interior is not plastic like the lower end units. And the shelves are glass, which makes for easy cleanup. The only negative is that it has no door handle. I would recommend this unit to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice refrigerator, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice refrigerator, especially for the price. The inside looks really nice and sleek, especially since there aren't wire racks. Only two complaints are: 1) no handle - which means the unit has to stick out a bit in our built-in BBQ in order to pull open the door; and 2) the tracks to set the height for the shelves are somewhat limiting for loading it up with drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in November. No problems so far. My outdoor bar is uncovered and it does get hot here in South Florida. Only minor inconvenience is the lack of a door handle. The height listed is inaccurate. It is actually a little taller. Some other reviews list the correct dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge. Bought it for my outdoor kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Nice fridge. Bought it for my outdoor kitchen, but turned out to be too tall for the space provided. Been using it indoor as a beverage fridge. After year and a half, thermostat controller was defective and inside of fridge froze (would not shut of at preselected temperature) Warranty expired after 12 months of course. Had my home warranty replace the controller, but it took a few months since the part wasn't readily available from vinotemp.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Svilenkovic

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor!
customer_reviews.text: The control main board went out after 3 years. There are a lot of other (less expensive) choices in the market this Vinotemp so I would expect better quality! Stay away unless you have money to burn!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product, especially when you consider it is rated for outdoor use. The motor is quiet, it keeps a constant temperature and looks really nice. Only negative I would give is there isn't any pull handle or indented side to grasp the door when opening. We have room between the cabinet wall and the door so it isn't a problem for us but something to take into consideration if putting this in a tight space. Otherwise we are really please with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Tcraig

customer_reviews.title: great frige
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last fall for our new outdoor kitchen. Have used it this year and are completely satisfied. It cools extremely fast and looks great. It is a little pricey but seems worth it so far.
customer_reviews.author: vibeguy-2009

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very roomy, and professional looking refrigerator that fits well with our outdoor kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: STG

customer_reviews.title: Great interior
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a very competitive price. Looks great in the breezeway and has complete interior for cooling. Blue light is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in our outdoor kitchen. Time will be the real test
customer_reviews.author: MBH

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. He was thrilled. The only problem I can find is the paint seems thin on the top. My daughter left a bottle that contained degreaser on top and it removed the paint. I plan on repainting it with an auto spray paint and hopefully that will keep it protected.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Unit higher than indicated on website
customer_reviews.text: Just received this Vinotemp 5.12 cu ft outdoor refrigerator. Vinotemp website and Amazon website state the unit is 33" high. Framed my BBQ area to this dimension. It turns out the refrigerator is actually 33 3/4" high and won't fit. Contacted Vinotemp and they were useless. After several calls, I finally got someone in "customer service". They did not know the dimensions were wrong and offered no solution. I asked if they can pick the unit up since I do not have the packaging and I am only 10-miles from the factory. "Can't do it, contact Amazon". Customer service at its finest.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lahey

product_meta.title: Vinotemp 5.12 Cu. Ft. Outdoor Refrigerator
product_meta.description:
Freestanding installation. Black color. 23.4 in. W x 22.3 in. D x 32.3 in. H (91 lbs.). Lead time: 3 to 5 days. Front Exhaust for built-in installation. Adjustable feet for leveling. Security lock. Internal LED light. Internal digital control panel. Stainless steel door with a recessed handle. Adjustable feet for leveling. Capacity: 5.12 cu. ft.. Temperature range: 34-43F. Warranty. Designed for either indoor or outdoor use. The internal digital control panel makes setting the perfect temperature simple, while the Dynamic Cooling feature enables you to store all of your goods under the exact same conditions.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Designed for either indoor or outdoor use, the Vinotemp 5.12 Cu. Ft. Outdoor Refrigerator can be installed as either a built-in or freestanding unit. The sleek black cabinet body and stainless steel door with recessed handle make this unit a stylish addition to any space. The internal digital control panel makes setting the perfect temperature simple, while the Dynamic Cooling feature enables you to store all of your goods under the exact same conditions. Other convenient features include leveling legs, an internal LED light, and four adjustable shelves.
feature_bullets: Internal digital control panel and blue LED lighting
Front vented exhaust system for built-in or freestanding installation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.6 out of 5 stars15 ratings2.6 out of 5 stars
